title: My pixel drains the battery in 45 min without using it and it charges 100% through usb port in 20 mi
content:
All of a sudden yesterday, my pixel 3 is draining pretty fast. It took less than 40 min to go from 100% to 1%. When I charged through computer USB, it reached 100% within 20 min. I tried all the setting suggested, restarted several times, and finally reset to factory setting. Still, no change in behaviour. Contacted Google support and they requested me to submit the bug report. I have to wait for their response.
Does anyone has similar issues? Any suggestions?
